articles.title: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.
articles.mainIdea: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.. Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on X that Tesla’s robo-taxis were unaffected. Coming into Tuesday trading, Tesla stock was up 21% this year, boosted by a 25% jump over the past month, despite falling EV sales. Recent share gains have left Tesla stock trading for about 225 times estimated 2026 earnings. Related tickers mentioned: ARKK, ARKQ, TSLA, ^DJI, ^GSPC.

articles.title: Cathie Wood Dumps $11 Milllion Worth Of Tesla Stock While Doubling Down On These Notable Crypto Plays
articles.mainIdea: Cathie Wood Dumps $11 Milllion Worth Of Tesla Stock While Doubling Down On These Notable Crypto Plays
articles.summary: Benzinga: Cathie Wood Dumps $11 Milllion Worth Of Tesla Stock While Doubling Down On These Notable Crypto Plays. On Thursday, Cathie Wood-led Ark Invest made significant trades involving Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA), Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN), and Brera Holdings PLC (NASDAQ:SLMT). The Tesla Trade Ark Invest executed a notable transaction by selling 23,110 shares of Tesla through its ARK Innovation ETF (BATS:ARKK). The sale, valued at approximately $11.2 million, comes amid a backdrop of Tesla’s stock pulling back after reaching all-time highs earlier in the week. articles.title: Ark Invest Adds 17,386 More Coinbase Stock after System Upgrade Announcement
articles.mainIdea: Ark Invest Adds 17,386 More Coinbase Stock after System Upgrade Announcement
articles.summary: Coinspeaker: Ark Invest Adds 17,386 More Coinbase Stock after System Upgrade Announcement. For the second time in less than one week, Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest has acquired more Coinbase (COIN) stock across its Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs). The asset management firm placed the bet on Coinbase, which recently unveiled a system upgrade earlier this week. Ark Invest Conducts Routine Portfolio Rebalancing Ark ... Related tickers mentioned: ARKK, BLSH, COIN, CRCL.
